items.title: LGÂ says itsÂ CLOiD home robot will be folding laundry and making breakfast at CES
items.summary: Lots of time to think about the robot uprising while folding laundry. LG teased that it would be showing off a new robot for a "zero labor home" at CES. We now have a bit more detail on what to expect. The company says that its CLOiD home robot can fetch milk from the fridge, put a croissant in theâ€¦

items.title: 'Struggling Frank trapped in gilded cage at joyless Tottenham'
items.summary: Struggling head coach Thomas Frank is trapped in a gilded cage at joyless Tottenham Hotspur, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.

items.title: Real Madrid youngster Garcia scores hat-trick in place of Mbappe
items.summary: Watch highlights as Real Madrid beat Real Betis 5-1, with 21-year-old striker Gonzalo Garcia, starting in place of the injured Kylian Mbappe, scoring a hat-trick.

items.title: Leeds 'devastated' as fan dies at game with Man Utd
items.summary: Leeds United say they are "devastated" after a supporter died before their Premier League game against Manchester United on Sunday.

items.title: Thelin 'accepts' Aberdeen sacking after winless run
items.summary: Aberdeen sack manager Jimmy Thelin following a five-match winless run and just eight months on from the club's Scottish Cup win.

items.title: 'I accept this decision' - Thelin sacked by Aberdeen
items.summary: Aberdeen sack manager Jimmy Thelin following a five-match winless run and just eight months on from the club's Scottish Cup win.

items.title: Radwan double helps Leicester triumph over Saracens
items.summary: Adam Radwan scores two tries as Leicester Tigers edge closer to The Prem play-off places with a 36-28 win over Saracens at Welford Road.

items.title: 'It's not enough'- Slot frustrated with Fulham draw
items.summary: Liverpool manager Arne Slot says "it's not enough" for his side to rely on late goals after a "frustrating" 2-2 draw against Fulham at Craven Cottage.

items.title: I will do my job for 18 months and then we move on - Amorim
items.summary: Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim says that in 18 months' time, when his contract is due to end, he will leave, repeatedly stating that he came to "manage" the club, not just to be a coach.

items.title: You can charge the battery in Belkinâ€™s new Switch 2 power case without opening it
items.summary: Belkin has announced a new version of one of its first accessories for the Switch 2 at CES 2026. The Charging Case Pro for Nintendo Switch 2 carries forward the same 10,000mAh internal battery as the original, but it's been redesigned so you don't need to remove the battery to charge it, and you noâ€¦

items.title: Belkinâ€™s new 3-in-1 charging dock isnâ€™t limited to the Apple Watch
items.summary: As convenient as 3-in-1 chargers can be, the vast majority of them work with a variety of smartphones and wireless earbuds, but only support one wearable: the Apple Watch. That's what sets the UltraCharge Modular Charging Dock that Belkin just announced at CES 2026 apart. Its design can accommodateâ€¦

items.title: Belkinâ€™s new HDMI adapter wirelessly connects to screens over 130 feet away
items.summary: Belkin has announced a new wireless display adapter that works without the need for a Wi-Fi network. The ConnectAir Wireless HDMI Display Adapter includes a USB-C transmitter you connect to devices like laptops, tablets, and phones, and an HDMI receiver that plugs into a display. You don't need to â€¦

items.title: Plaud updates the NotePin with a button
items.summary: You must be able to trust the NotePin S â€” doctors use it! Plaud has updated its compact NotePin AI recorder. The new NotePin S is almost identical to the original, except for one major difference: a button. It's joined by a new Plaud Desktop app for recording audio in online meetings, which is freeâ€¦

items.title: 'I'm here to be manager, not coach' - but will Amorim survive at Man Utd?
items.summary: Ruben Amorim challenges Manchester United's board to let him do his job after Sunday's draw with Leeds, and says he intends to leave in 18 months' time.

items.title: SwitchBot says its humanoid household robot can do your laundry
items.summary: The Onero H1 is a humanoid household robot on wheels. | Image: SwitchBot SwitchBot is bringing a new household robot to CES 2026. The smart home company is launching the Onero H1, which it calls "the most accessible AI household robot." The announcement follows last year's debut of its multitaskingâ€¦

items.title: You can unlock SwitchBotâ€™s first deadbolt smart lock with your face
items.summary: The Lock Vision deadbolt replaces your existing door lock instead of being retrofitted over it. SwitchBot has announced a new deadbolt smart lock that can be unlocked with a glance. Like the Keypad Vision that SwitchBot launched last year, the new Lock Vision series unveiled at CES uses 3D facial râ€¦

items.title: SwitchBotâ€™s new E Ink display seems great for weather nerds
items.summary: One of SwitchBot's most interesting products announced at CES 2026 is one of its most basic. The Weather Station, as it's called, is a 7.5-inch framed E Ink screen that's packed with weather-related data. Its interface shows info including the date, time, weather, a six-day weather forecast, and whâ€¦

items.title: SwitchBotâ€™s AI audio recorder is a â€˜second brainâ€™ for memories
items.summary: The button-like SwitchBot AI MindClip can be discreetly attached to your clothing, bag straps, or lanyards. SwitchBot is joining the AI voice recorder bandwagon, introducing its own clip-on gadget that captures and organizes your every conversation. The SwitchBot AI MindClip announced at CES recordâ€¦

items.title: SwitchBotâ€™s AI-powered desk light looks like a pixel-art snow globe
items.summary: Ponder the orb, but with a retro pixel-art vibe. SwitchBot's new RGB desk light lets you put a teeny version of the Las Vegas Sphere in your home. The AI-powered Obboto lamp announced at CES is described by SwitchBot as an "expressive globe light companion" that can display preset animations and usâ€¦

items.summary: Connacht champions St Brigid's advance into the final of the All-Ireland Club Senior Football Championship with a 1-16 to 1-12 victory over Scotstown at Breffni Park.

items.summary: Intel's elusive Arc B770 graphics card, the successor to the Arc A770 has been part of the rumor mill for what seems like forever now, but it's finally close to a release. New code on an Intel GitHub repository mentions "b770" specifically, suggesting the company has pushed out an update to add supâ€¦

items.title: Four are in - but who might complete Premier League Darts line-up?
items.summary: Four players - including World Championship finalists Luke Littler and Gian van Veen - have guaranteed their place, but who are the contenders to fill the four invitational slots in 2026?

items.title: German retail supplier allegedly rationing RTX 5070 GPUs â€” more powerful Nvidia graphics cards are completely out of stock
items.summary: An alleged German retailer shared the email they received from their supplier, saying that RTX 5070 GPU deliveries will be limited to five units per model, while 5070 Ti models and up are totally unavailable.

items.title: Huawei FreeBuds 7i review
